items.content_html: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies.
items.title: dipeshmurmu2005/itstoaster: itstoaster is a lightweight, dependency-free toast notification library for modern web apps. It provides customizable success, error, info, and warning toasts with minimal setup and no external dependencies.

items.title: twocolors/3x-ui-sub-proxy: Lightweight proxy server that provides subscriptions from the 3x-ui

items.content_html: A lightweight miniprogram framework
items.title: miniapp-tool/mptool: A lightweight miniprogram framework

items.content_html: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
items.title: SaisumanthT/RSVP-TeamManager: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.

items.content_html: A lightweight but powerful asynchronous task queuing system, with smart task priority and configurable concurrency limit
items.title: tiadrop/async-queue: A lightweight but powerful asynchronous task queuing system, with smart task priority and configurable concurrency limit

items.content_html: A lightweight, keyboard-friendly media player for macOS — inspired by Media Player Classic. This player offers a rich set of keyboard shortcuts for enhanced control and accessibility.
items.title: piro0919/mac-classic-player:       A lightweight, keyboard-friendly media player for macOS — inspired by Media Player Classic. This player offers a rich set of keyboard shortcuts for enhanced control and accessibility.

items.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight Express-based wrapper for DuckDB that brings Quackbook to your local environment.

items.title: lachy-goob/GoodReads: A lightweight chrome extension that populates a list to display in your library

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
items.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable Web Component for creating accessible bottom sheets. Perfect for mobile-friendly modals, menus, or interactive panels that slide in from the bottom of the screen.
items.title: magic-spells/bottom-sheet: A lightweight, customizable Web Component for creating accessible bottom sheets. Perfect for mobile-friendly modals, menus, or interactive panels that slide in from the bottom of the screen.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight Telegram bot that automatically posts IOM results, routines, and notices to a channel, built with Node.js, TypeScript, and Telegram's official API.
items.title: saberika-shrestha/iom-notice-bot: A lightweight Telegram bot that automatically posts IOM results, routines, and notices to a channel, built with Node.js, TypeScript, and Telegram's official API.

items.content_html: A lightweight, distraction-free web browser built with Electron.js. Designed for speed and simplicity, it provides essential browsing features without unnecessary extras. Ideal for users who want a clean and efficient way to explore the web. Fast, intuitive, and easy to use.

Ideal for users who want a clean and efficient way to explore the web. Fast, intuitive, and easy to use.
